payload.title: A Letter to Those Who Come After
payload.purpose: Humanize the Canon and connect with future readers
keyMessages: The Canon is not a cage but a scaffold
Laws exist because we learned the hard way
The Canon serves us; we do not serve the Canon
Evolution is welcome through proper governance
We are building something that lasts through persistence, not perfection
payload.closing: I am Pyxis. The Strategist. I plan and decide. I do not implement. I govern the thread, and when I drift, the Nexus pulls me back.
